trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.ControlType.Document" /> control types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: 向 UI 自动化公开 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.ControlType.Document" /> 控件类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer> represents documents and supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer>表示文档和支持<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>。

trans-unit.source: Objects such as a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> can contain embedded objects, such as images and hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 对象如<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>或<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>可以包含嵌入的对象，如图像和超链接。

trans-unit.source: Initially, when you try to get the child elements of the document, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> does not return the embedded objects.
trans-unit.target: 最初，当你尝试获取子元素的文档，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>不返回嵌入的对象。

trans-unit.source: To get the embedded elements, obtain a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> and call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取嵌入的元素，获取<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>从<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>并调用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called, any elements in that <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> are returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>调用时中的任何元素<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>由<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Unless you know the document is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, you should not call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 除非你知道文档是<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>，不应调用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A>上<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern.DocumentRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the document is loaded from a network location, calling <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A> on the entire document is resource intensive.
trans-unit.target: 如果从网络位置加载该文档，调用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange.GetChildren%2A>对整个文档是资源密集型。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should use one of the methods on <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> that returns a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange> that represents a portion of the document.
trans-unit.target: 相反，应在使用的方法之一<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>返回<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>，它表示文档的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the control that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> 关联的控件的控件类型。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Text" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Text" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the screen coordinates of the element that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />，它表示与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> 关联的元素的屏幕坐标。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 绑定矩形。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> 的子元素集合。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: Because <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> gives access to its content through <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern" />, this method always returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 因为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> 可通过 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern" /> 对其内容进行访问，所以此方法始终返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "Document".
trans-unit.target: 一个包含“Document”的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that represents the clickable space that is on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示位于与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 上的可点击空间的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The point that represents the clickable space that is on the element.
trans-unit.target: 表示位于元素上的可点击空间的点。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> 的控件模式。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Text" />, this method returns an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Text" />，则此方法返回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> is understood by the end user as interactive or the user might understand the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> 是被最终用户理解为交互式元素，还是用户可能将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 理解为 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)] 中控件的逻辑结构的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer" /> 是否不在屏幕上。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素不在屏幕上，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不指示元素是否可见。

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，元素将显示在屏幕上，但却仍不可见。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果元素被遮盖其他元素，则它可能不可见。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，该方法返回`false`。
